data.title: Water Resources of Turkey [1st ed.] 978
data.meta_description: This book provides an in-depth description of water resources of Turkey, a country with a unique geographical location,...
data.text:
Table of contents :

Front Matter ....Pages i-xxi

Introduction (Nilgun B. Harmancioglu)....Pages 1-9

Water Works of Ancient Civilizations (Unal Ozis, Ahmet Alkan, Yalcin Ozdemir)....Pages 11-59

Water Resources Development (Dogan Altinbilek, Murat Ali Hatipoglu)....Pages 61-84

Climate and Drought in Turkey (Murat Turkes)....Pages 85-125

Surface Water (Hafzullah Aksoy)....Pages 127-158

Groundwater (Hasan Yazicigil, Mehmet Ekmekci)....Pages 159-201

Water Quality (Orhan Uslu)....Pages 203-240

Water Resources Potential of Turkey (Bülent Selek, Hakan Aksu)....Pages 241-256

Agricultural Water Use (Mahmut Cetin)....Pages 257-302

Water and Energy (Unal Ozis, Ertugrul Benzeden, Ahmet Alkan)....Pages 303-340

Urban and Industrial Water Uses (Selmin Burak, Hakan Mat)....Pages 341-398

Transboundary River Basins (Unal Ozis, Nilgun B. Harmancioglu, Yalcin Ozdemir)....Pages 399-444

River Basin Management (Bülent Selek, Zeliha Selek)....Pages 445-465

Impacts of Climate Change on Precipitation Climatology and Variability in Turkey (Murat Turkes, M. Tufan Turp, Nazan An, Tugba Ozturk, M. Levent Kurnaz)....Pages 467-491

Legal and Institutional Foundations of Turkey’s Domestic and Transboundary Water Policy (Aysegul Kibaroglu)....Pages 493-516

Sustainability Issues in Water Management in the Context of Water Security (Nilgun B. Harmancioglu, Cem P. Cetinkaya, Filiz Barbaros)....Pages 517-533

Challenges for the Future (Dogan Altinbilek, Nilgun B. Harmancioglu)....Pages 535-540

Back Matter ....Pages 541-545
